body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Indoor Activities              Indoor Activities        The visitor center at Charles Pinckney NHS.       The visitor center is located in a Lowcountry farmhouse dated to circa 1828, after the Pinckney era. The museum exhibits are self-guiding with park staff available for interpretive services. A 20-minute orientation video is shown on request. Educational programs tailored for students and adults are offered throughout the year. Advance reservations for educational programs are required.
title: Charles Pinckney National Historic Site: Indoor Activities
